title: Incident Reporting
description: Guides users through whether an incident should be reported.

q1.text: Does the incident involve sensitive data?

q2.text: Was the sensitive data exposed externally?

Yes.explanation: This incident should be reported to relevant authorities and stakeholders immediately.

No.explanation: Document internally and review with security/compliance team. External reporting may not be required.

q3.text: Does the incident affect critical systems or operations?

Yes.explanation: This incident should be reported due to impact on critical systems.

No.explanation: No reporting required, continue monitoring. Document the incident for internal records.
